scripts.build: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=80 --gc-global --optimize-for-size' DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true TSC_COMPILE_ON_ERROR=true SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true react-scripts build
scripts.prebuild: npm cache clean --force && npm install react-scripts typescript --no-audit --no-fund --no-optional --production=false
scripts.postbuild: npm uninstall react-scripts typescript --silent || true; npm cache clean --force; npm prune --production
